explains: v. 零售（retail 的 ing 形式）

sentences.en: She spent fourteen years in retailing.
Electronic retailing has predictably become known as e-tailing.
sentences.cn: 网上零售业正如所料地以变得为人所知了。

sentences.en: They've got fruit retailing down to a fine art. You can be sure that your pears will ripen in day.
sentences.cn: 他们精于水果零售之道。你可以放心，你那些梨一天之内就会熟。
